verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Come, Thou Almighty King.
Help us Thy name to sing.
Help us to praise.

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Father, all glorious,
O'er all victorious.
Come and reign over us,
Ancient of Days.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Come, Thou Incarnate Word,
Gird on Thy mighty sword,
Our prayer attend.

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Come, and Thy people bless,
And give Thy Word success.
Spirit of holiness,
On us descend.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Come, Holy Comforter,
Thy sacred witness bear
In this glad hour.

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Thou who almighty art,
Now rule in every heart;
And ne'er from us depart,
Spirit of power.

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
To the great One in Three
Eternal praises be
Hence evermore.

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
His sovereign majesty
May we in glory see,
And to eternity
Love and adore.

verse.name: v5a
v5b
verse.lines:
Thy sov'reign majesty
May we in glory see,
And to eternity
Love and adore.
